title: Mulumathy Lyrics Jodhaa Akbar
stanzas:
avalai orunaal
naan paarthaen
idhayam kodu ena
varam kaetten

kaal thadame padhiyaadhu
kadal theevu avalthaane
athan avvsanai manalil
poochediyaaga enai vaithaen

kaettadhume marakkadhu
mellisaiyum avalthaane
adhan pallavi charanam
purindhum mounaththil nindren

oru karaiyaaga aval irukka
marukaraiyaaga naan irukka
idaiyil thanimai thalumbudhe
nadhiyaai

kaanal neeril muthedukka
kaigal ninaithaal
mudindhidumaa
nigazhkaalam naduve
vedikkai paarthidudhe

amaidhiyudan aval vandhaal
viralgalai naan pidithu kondaen
pala vaanavil parthae
valiyil thodarndhadhu payanam

urakkam vandhe thalai kodha
marathadiye ilaipaara
kan thirandhen avalum illai
kasandhadhu nimidam

arugil irundhaal oru nimidam
tholaivil therindhaal
marunimidam
kangalil maraiyum
poimaan pol
odugiraal

avalukkum enakkum
naduinile
idai ondru therindhadhu
edhirinile
mugamudi anindhaal
mugamum therindhidumaa

seo.title: Mulumathy Lyrics Jodhaa Akbar
seo.description: Get the complete Mulumathy Lyrics Jodhaa Akbar from Jodhaa Akbar. Read the lyrics penned by Vaali and composed by AR Rahman and sung by Srinivas. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vaali, Jodhaa Akbar, AR Rahman, Srinivas, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
